description: FBI announced a task force to investigate a series of violent incidents targeting Tesla properties and vehicles, characterizing the attacks as domestic terrorism
notes: Part of broader pattern of political violence and institutional tension

sources.title: FBI says it is probing 'increase in violent activity toward Tesla'
FBI launches task force to crack down on attacks against Tesla
FBI investigating increase in violent activity toward Tesla

summary: The FBI launched a specialized task force to investigate over 80 reported incidents of vandalism, arson, and violent attacks targeting Tesla vehicles, dealerships, and facilities across multiple U.S. states. FBI Director Kash Patel characterized these attacks as 'domestic terrorism' and pledged to pursue and prosecute those responsible.
title: FBI launches task force investigating violent attacks on Tesla
